history.narrative: Law 6-124, the “Public Assistance Amendments Act of 1986,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 6-339, which was referred to the Committee on Human Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 25, 1986, and April 15, 1986, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 2, 1986, it was assigned Act No. 6-160 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
